bookAuthors: Natsuki Takaya, Alethea Nibley, Athena Nibley
Plot: A family with an ancient curse... And the girl who will change their lives forever... Tohru Honda was an orphan with no place to go until the mysterious Sohma family offered her a place to call home. Now her ordinary high school life is turned upside down as she's introduced to the Sohma's world of magical curses and family secrets.
Characters: Tohru Honda, Yuki Sohma, Kyo Sohma, Shigure Sohma, Hatori Sohma, Hatsuharu Sohma, Akito Sohma, Momiji Sohma
